vocabInfos.lsjDefs: Lat. Phoebe, one of the daughters of Uranus and Gaia, [8th/7th c.BC]; mother of Phoebus, [6th/5th c.BC] (Middle Liddel)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.1
§ Phoebe, "radiant"
Phoebe, (Proper name), Rom. 16:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
非比 这个陰性專有名詞在希腊文的意思是 "煥發的"
近哥林多地方堅革哩教會的女執事
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
非比 这个阴性专有名词在希腊文的意思是 "焕发的"
近哥林多地方坚革哩教会的女执事
